Smart Stapler: A stapler that can detect the type of paper being used and adjust the stapling pressure and temperature accordingly, ensuring the perfect staple every time.
Portable Stapler: A compact and lightweight stapler that can be taken anywhere, making it perfect for on-the-go stapling needs.
Stapler with Built-in Scanner: A stapler that can scan documents as they are being stapled, creating a digital copy for easy access and organization.
Stapler with Transparent Plates: A stapler with transparent plates that allow users to see the stapling process and ensure that the staples are being placed in the correct location.
Stapler with Voice Commands: A stapler that can be controlled using voice commands, allowing users to staple documents without having to manually operate the stapler.
